alert.note: Alert for Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 8:04PM CDT until June 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Kansas, including the following counties, Finney and Kearny. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 804 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northwestern Finney and Northeastern Kearny Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
